      • transform

        public static Model transform​(ModelInfo src,
                              Model srcData,
                              ModelInfo dst)
        Transforms the Model described by src into a new Model consistent with the populated fields in dst. The following fields in dst are used for transformation:
        • ModelInfo.srid - if not -1, the target Spatial Reference
        • ModelInfo.localFrame - if not null, the target local frame
        The fields of dst will be populated on return as follows:
        • ModelInfo.srid - if -1, will be set to src.srid
        • ModelInfo.localFrame - if null, will be set to src.localFrame
        • ModelInfo.altitudeMode - will be set to src.altitudeMode
        • ModelInfo.location - will be set to src.location
        • ModelInfo.minDisplayResolution - will be set to src.minDisplayResolution
        • ModelInfo.maxDisplayResolution - will be set to src.maxDisplayResolution
        • ModelInfo.type - will be set to null
        • ModelInfo.uri - will be set to null
        • ModelInfo.name - will be set to src.name
        Parameters:
        src - The information for the source model data
        srcData - The source model data
        dst - The information for the destination model data.
        Returns:

      • transform

        public static Model transform​(Model src,
                              VertexDataLayout dstLayout)
        Transforms a model into the destination layout described by a VertexDataLayout.
        Parameters:
        src - the source model.
        dstLayout - the destination layout
        Returns:
        null if the transform fails to be adapted into a native model or if the native model fails to be transformed.
